text: Norma Gladys Cappagli (20 September 1939 â€“ 22 December 2020) was an Argentine model and beauty queen. She won the 1960 Miss World contest, after being crowned Miss Argentina World 1960. She was the first model from Argentina to win the title. She was born in Buenos Aires. On 17 December 2020, Cappagli was hospitalized under critical condition after being hit by a bus in Buenos Aires. She died from her injuries five days later on 22 December, aged 81. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Road accident deaths Category:Argentine models Category:Miss World winners Category:People from Buenos Aires
title: Norma Cappagli
